Thanks :tada: 

If CI passes, please remove the label `awaiting-CI` and merge this yourself, by adding a comment `bors r+`.

bors d+

:v: semorrison can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

As this PR is labelled `auto-merge-after-CI`, we are now sending it to bors:

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.
